\subsection{Detailed Description}
This class will represent an area in the P300 speller that can be filled with graphical objects such as \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GButton}{GButton}, \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GSymbol}{GSymbol}... When draw function is called it will call the draw function on itself and all its children

\subsection{Member Function Documentation}
\hypertarget{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_acc79c6a7cba3e04e2b936ebda77b7e31}{
\index{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer@{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer}!addChild@{addChild}}
\index{addChild@{addChild}!OpenViBEApplications::GContainer@{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer}}
\subsubsection[{addChild}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}virtual void OpenViBEApplications::GContainer::addChild (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf GObject} $\ast$}]{child, }
\item[{OpenViBE::float32}]{offsetX, }
\item[{OpenViBE::float32}]{offsetY, }
\item[{OpenViBE::float32}]{width, }
\item[{OpenViBE::float32}]{height, }
\item[{OpenViBE::float32}]{depth}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily  \mbox{[}virtual\mbox{]}}}}
\label{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_acc79c6a7cba3e04e2b936ebda77b7e31}
The position of the graphical object child is computed based on the parameters you provide here (those are relative to the container, left lower corner represented by 0,0 and upper right corner represented by 1,1) 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em child} & the graphical object you want to add to the container \\
\hline
{\em offsetX} & number between zero and one indicating where it should be placed within the container 0.5 would mean will be positioned halfway (horizontally) in the container \\
\hline
{\em offsetY} & number between zero and one indicating where it should be placed within the container \\
\hline
{\em width} & number between zero and one indicating the width of the element relative to the container 1.0 would mean the child takes up the entire width of the container \\
\hline
{\em height} & number between zero and one, same interpretation as the height \\
\hline
{\em depth} & number between -\/1.0 and 1.0, -\/1.0 meaning towards the back, 1.0 towards the front \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\hypertarget{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_a5a65050110f1e269905e2de75f281695}{

\hypertarget{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_ab02678f9c301ae4e78ca2514a062c645}{
\index{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer@{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer}!setDimParameters@{setDimParameters}}
\index{setDimParameters@{setDimParameters}!OpenViBEApplications::GContainer@{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer}}
\subsubsection[{setDimParameters}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void GContainer::setDimParameters (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf BoxDimensions}}]{dim}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily  \mbox{[}virtual\mbox{]}}}}
\label{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_ab02678f9c301ae4e78ca2514a062c645}
Sets the x, y, height, width and depth parameters of the object. It also sets the internal state of the object to changed. It will also call deleteAndCreateGLResources because the code needs to be rewritten to graphical memory with the new dimensions and thus new resources need to be created and the old ones deleted 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em dim} & the dimensions of the object (in OpenGL units, \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1P300MainContainer}{P300MainContainer} redefines the space so that 1 unit is 1 pixel). \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
